name: Guru of Love - Instant Love Quotes
name_original: Guru of Love - Instant Love Quotes
description:
Get instant love advice and quotes. Let your moments fill with nostalgia and bring out the love and emotion into the moment.

Ask the house Guru or become your own Guru of Love for party fun with friends.

It is a handy reference to bring perspective into your life - it provides hours of fun and amusement with friends.

Cool features:

- Loads of Love Advice
- Change & activate collection
- Create your own personalized love quotes collection
- Flashcards

Courtesy some vectors Created by Freepik
